attributes.action: stop the proposed closure of BBC 6music.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recent BBC strategy review includes a proposal to close the 6music radio station.  The undersigned believe that 6music should be saved. 6music is a unique radio station and plays music not heard elsewhere on the BBC or other commercial radio stations.

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
